t2.Experienced Fighter: Attacked targets take 20% more DMG. Does not stack.
t2.Excellent Strategy: Increases CC ACC of all allies by 150. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 50 additional CC ACC applies.
t2.Battle Cry: Increases HP of all allies by 15%. If the ally uses the same Perk, only 5% additional HP applies.
t2.Shield of Protection: Block Rate is increased by 200 and CC resistance is increased by 200.
t2.Swift Move: Increases ATK Spd by 200 and ACC by 400.
